content: nginx ssh-key connection exception Not long ago, I wanted to restart the companyâ€™s gitlab server.I couldnâ€™t coonect to ssh when it restarted.emmâ€¦â€¦I try copy the ssh rsa.pub,but it didnâ€™t work. error log: identity_sign: private key ~/.ssh/id_rsa contents do not match public what is happenï¼Ÿ solution reconfigure gitlab ssh key! create new ssh key ssh-keygen -t rsa -C 'git@gitlab.com' -f ~/.ssh/gitlab-rsa update config file,enter ~./ssh,open config # add host Host gitlab.com HostName gitlab.com IdentityFile ~/.ssh/gitlab_id-rsa enter http://gitlab.com ,Profile Settingsâ€“>SSH Keysâ€“>Add SSH Key You are done
title: nginx ssh-key connection exception
